title: New champion in making
body:
I was bored and my friend and me started to make a new champion and the only thing missing is the champion design. Im not very good at drawing so im gonna make a sketch soon.
Little bit about the champion.His name is Kirakou the mercyless assassin.
The quote that he sais when you select him in chapion select is: That face, did I kill you before?
Passive-No mercy
When Kirakou is out of battle he generates rage. When he atacks an enemy champion with a basic atack he consumes 50 rage to deal 50+10% of the targets max hp +10 per champion level bonus magic damage.
Killing a minion, monster or geting a critical strike generates 5 rage and geting a kill or asist generates 10 rage.
Q-Death dagers
Kirakou switches between 2 tipes of dagers.
Mercenary dagers
Every basic atack generates 5 banus rage when atacking a champion with a basic atack and deals 10/25/40/60/80+20%AP bonus magic damage evry 10 seconds. Each time he atacks an enemy champion with a basic atack the cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds.
Assassin dagers
Basic atacks against enemy champions deal 10% of bonus atack damage as bonus phisical damage over 5 seconds (this can stack for up to 5 times). Atacking a turet deals 10/15/25/35/50 bonus magic damage on hit.
W-Dager storm
Kirakou throws 8 dagers in a target direction which deal 70/100/130/160/200+75% bonus AD and shatter upon hiting an enemy. The dagers then pass through the target dealing reduced damage to other enemies hit-60/90/120/155/195+60% bonus AD
E-Death dash
Kirakou dashes a large distance and pulls all enemy units with him. At the end of the dash all the units are pulled even more and take 20/40/60/90/110+25%AD and slows them by 20/30/40/50/60% for 3 seconds.
R-Life taker
Kirakou chanels for 1 second and then teleports to the targeted enemy champion and deals 100/250/500+10/20/35% of the targets current hp+80%AD as psihucal damage. The chanel can be interupted ba taking damage from a champion tower or monster.
